chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams base_params
pb_params: PrimaryBackupParams base_params

Goal:
forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace tr

Premises:
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name
Record PrimaryBackupParams (base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_PrimaryBackupParams { input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_PrimaryBackupParams _ _%function_scope
step_async_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_async : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) Arguments step_async_star {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace = fun (A B C : Type) (tr : list (A * (B + list C))) => forall x : A * (B + list C), In x tr -> zero_or_one_outputs_per_step x : forall A B C : Type, list (A * (B + list C)) -> Prop Arguments zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace {A B C}%type_scope _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pbj_NOABT : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> no_output_at_backup_trace tr
simulation : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> step_1_star init (revert_state net) (revert_trace tr)
transformer : forall P : list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall (st : data) (tr : list (input * output)), step_1_star init st tr -> P tr) -> forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> P (revert_trace tr)
correspond_reachable : forall (net : network) (tr_m : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr_m -> forall (st : data) (tr_1 : list (input * output)), step_1_star init st tr_1 -> inputs_1 tr_1 = inputs_m tr_m -> correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m
network_invariant_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' tr -> network_invariant net -> network_invariant net'
inductive_simulation : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' tr -> step_1_star (revert_state net) (revert_state net') (revert_trace tr)
step_async_outputs_m : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' tr -> inputs_m tr = [] /\ outputs_m tr = [] /\ nwState net Primary = nwState net' Primary \/ inputs_m tr = [] /\ (exists os : output, outputs_m tr = [os]) \/ (exists i : input, inputs_m tr = [i])
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_network -> list Net.name * ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list Net.name) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params...
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list Net.name) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), ~ In h failed ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_sind : forall P : ordered_network -> ordered_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> P net net' tr) ->...-> P o o0 l

step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o o0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]

StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list Net.name) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams]...
StepOrdered_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr
StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered net net' tr
Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (Net.name * (input + output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope

step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list Net.name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (Net.name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

correspond_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr_m' : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_async net net' tr_m' -> forall (st st' : data) (tr_m : list (name * (input + list output))) (tr_1 tr_1' : list (input * output)), correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m -> step_1_star st st' tr_1' -> inputs_1 tr_1' = inputs_m tr_m' -> correspond st' (nwState net') (tr_1 ++ tr_1') (tr_m ++ tr_m')

step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) -> (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := xs ++ ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> P net net' []) ->...-> P n n0 l
Inductive step_ordered_failure (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation (list Net.name * ordered_network) (Net.name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list Net.name) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + output))) (m : Net.msg) (ms : list Net.msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) (from to : Net.name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate Net.name_eq_dec to (update2 Net.name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} ->...
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
inputs_m_on_cons : forall (t : name * (input + list output)) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), inputs_m (t :: tr) = (let (n, s) := t in match n with | Primary => match s with | inl (Request i) => i :: inputs_m tr | _ => inputs_m tr end | Backup => inputs_m tr end)
step_1_star_no_trace_no_step : forall (st st' : data) (tr : list (input * output)), step_1_star st st' tr -> tr = [] -> st = st'
